```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

## Problem 1
import data
```{r}
pols_df = 
  read_csv("./data/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month","day"), sep=c(4,7)) |>
  mutate (
    month = 
    case_match(
      month, 
      "-01" ~ "January",
      "-02" ~ "Febuary",
      "-03" ~ "March",
      "-04" ~ "April", 
      "-05" ~ "May",
      "-06" ~ "June",
      "-07" ~ "July",
      "-08" ~ "August",
      "-09" ~ "September",
      "-10" ~ "October",
      "-11" ~ "November",
      "-12" ~ "December",
    )
  ) |>
  mutate (
    president = 
    case_match(
      prez_gop,
    0 ~ "dem", 
    1 ~ "gop")
  ) |>
  subset(select = -c(day, prez_dem, prez_gop))
```

clean data in snp.csv
